name: Listened to NFL combine sleepers, Art Briles resigns at Grambling & mailbag!

content.html:
Stew and Bruce are back for another episode during the NFL combine. Who are some under-the-radar prospects to keep an eye on? Art Briles resigned from Grambling hours after Hue Jackson hired him to be offensive coordinator. Last week, Bruce stopped by Miami to chat with new Head Coach Mario Cristobal. The ‘Canes are fast-tracking football facility improvement. Plus, mailbag questions on Nick Saban’s past at Michigan State, the worst coaching firings in the last 20 years, the future of TV rights deals and how the guys talk football with their kids. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

By The Audible with Stew & Bruce: A show about college football
